channel.title: Mistex - Your Adventure
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT=Trebuchet MS] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZfbwbJv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/q83AapS.png[/img] [IMG]http://s2.postimg.org/1waex5o10/9j41t1.png[/img] What makes a PvP server stand out? What makes a PvP server unique from the rest? What makes a PvP server perfect? The answer to these questions are different for each player. So how is it possible to make a server perfect for everyone? It isn't. Mistex is not a server that will be perfect, no it will not make each and every player happy, but what it will be is a server that strives to accommodate each and every player. With toggles for almost everything, fun achievements, flawless combat, unique features, Mistex will be a server that is the closest to being perfect. Unlike many server's that ignore the complaints and requests of players, our staff team will be dedicated to ensure that each player's voice will be heard. Mistex is the next up and coming server that will be the home to many! [B][SIZE=5]The Idea Behind Mistex[/SIZE][/B] The idea for Mistex is simple and yet unique. Many successful private servers usually have two or more worlds (World 1 - Eco - World 2 - PvP). It is also common knowledge that eco servers strive more than pvp servers. With this being in mind we have decided to revolutionize this by making two worlds in one. Upon login a player will be able to set all of his combat statistics to the max level, however non-combat skills must be trained. The player will login in a world 1 which is eco, players are able to sell their items, battle fierce bosses, skill, troll, and whatever they please. However, if the player decides to type ::pvp (most likely going to change it from a command) then then the world around them will be all PvP. If another player is in this PvP mode they will be able to battle eachother, while if someone else is in eco they will not be able to interact with eachother. [B][SIZE=5]Development Team[/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img] Play Boy - Server/Client Developer/Project Leader [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img] Daniel - Server Developer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img] Evan - Client Developer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img] Jad - Lead Forums Developer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img] Hank - Forums Developer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img] Aust1n - Graphics Designer [B][SIZE=5]Server Completion:[/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://www.yarntomato.com/percentbarmaker/button.php?barPosition=50&leftFill=%23990000[/img] [B][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE][/B]
* Fullscreen (Fixed, Resized, Fullscreen) * Fullscreen/Resizeable/Fixed * Pk Statue Minigame * Highschores * Perfect Switching * Many Fun Achievements * Fun Pking * Player Profiler * New Shop System * Vote4points * Automatic Donation System * Donator Statuses (Normal, Super, Extreme) * Loyalty Titles * All Working Specials * Perfect Duel Arena * Item Spawns * Click on skill to level * Curses * Quick Prayers * Clan Chat System * Bank Pins * $5 Hoes
[B][SIZE=5]Media[/SIZE][/B] [SPOILER=Pictures] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TO07iLV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MZ5f6MK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tq0kAJd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/knyKj1a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/d8anPQ2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/foNm2UJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ucOzx9u.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/byHpy9H.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kBkyqjh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Y0gf9lt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YY9BELS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VF33TCB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nhSGXVo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QZdhwMw.png[/img] [IMG]http://prntscr.com/34zmea[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GDhvPAj.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=GIFs] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nxn3Jnc.gif[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Videos] Coming soon... [/SPOILER] [CENTER] [SIZE=6]Credits:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/fugue/icon_shadowless/tick-small.png[/img] Play Boy [IMG]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/fugue/icon_shadowless/tick-small.png[/img] Daniel [IMG]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/fugue/icon_shadowless/tick-small.png[/img] FrostBit3 [IMG]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/fugue/icon_shadowless/tick-small.png[/img] Oliver Sykes [IMG]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/fugue/icon_shadowless/tick-small.png[/img] Pastor Jack [IMG]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/fugue/icon_shadowless/tick-small.png[/img] Galkon [IMG]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/fugue/icon_shadowless/tick-small.png[/img] Jason [IMG]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/fugue/icon_shadowless/tick-small.png[/img] Sam [IMG]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/fugue/icon_shadowless/tick-small.png[/img] Eliminate [/CENTER]

item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

[CENTER][FONT=Trebuchet MS]

What makes a PvP server stand out? What makes a PvP server unique from the rest? What makes a PvP server perfect? The answer to these questions are different for each player. So how is it possible to make a server perfect for everyone? It isn’t. Mistex is not a server that will be perfect, no it will not make each and every player happy, but what it will be is a server that strives to accommodate each and every player. With toggles for almost everything, fun achievements, flawless combat, unique features, Mistex will be a server that is the closest to being perfect. Unlike many server’s that ignore the complaints and requests of players, our staff team will be dedicated to ensure that each player’s voice will be heard. Mistex is the next up and coming server that will be the home to many!

[B][SIZE=5]The Idea Behind Mistex[/SIZE][/B]

The idea for Mistex is simple and yet unique. Many successful private servers usually have two or more worlds (World 1 - Eco - World 2 - PvP). It is also common knowledge that eco servers strive more than pvp servers. With this being in mind we have decided to revolutionize this by making two worlds in one. Upon login a player will be able to set all of his combat statistics to the max level, however non-combat skills must be trained. The player will login in a world 1 which is eco, players are able to sell their items, battle fierce bosses, skill, troll, and whatever they please. However, if the player decides to type ::pvp (most likely going to change it from a command) then then the world around them will be all PvP. If another player is in this PvP mode they will be able to battle eachother, while if someone else is in eco they will not be able to interact with eachother.
